verses.text: \w Have|strong="H1732"\w* pity on me, O God, \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w your|strong="H1732"\w* mercy; out \w of|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H1732"\w* full heart, take away \w my|strong="H1732"\w* sin.
Let all \w my|strong="H0834"\w* wrongdoing \w be|strong="H5030"\w* washed \w away|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* make \w me|strong="H0413"\w* clean \w from|strong="H0935"\w* evil.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H6588"\w* \w am|strong="H0430"\w* conscious \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H7230"\w* error; \w my|strong="H7230"\w* sin \w is|strong="H0430"\w* ever \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

Against \w you|strong="H7235"\w*, \w you|strong="H7235"\w* \w only|strong="H7235"\w*, \w have|strong="H5771"\w* \w I|strong="H5771"\w* done \w wrong|strong="H5771"\w*, working that which \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w evil|strong="H5771"\w* \w in|strong="H2403"\w* \w your|strong="H3526"\w* eyes; so that \w your|strong="H3526"\w* words may be seen \w to|strong="H5771"\w* be right, \w and|strong="H5771"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* may be clear \w when|strong="H7235"\w* \w you|strong="H7235"\w* \w are|strong="H5771"\w* judging.

\w Truly|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w was|strong="H0589"\w* formed \w in|strong="H3045"\w* evil, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* did \w my|strong="H3045"\w* mother give \w me|strong="H0589"\w* birth.

\w Your|strong="H8199"\w* desire \w is|strong="H0905"\w* \w for|strong="H4616"\w* \w what|strong="H7451"\w* \w is|strong="H0905"\w* true \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* inner parts: \w in|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H8199"\w* secrets \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H1696"\w* soul \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w give|strong="H6663"\w* \w me|strong="H1696"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* wisdom.
Make \w me|strong="H0517"\w* free \w from|strong="H0517"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* \w with|strong="H5771"\w* hyssop: let \w me|strong="H0517"\w* \w be|strong="H0517"\w* washed whiter than snow.

\w Make|strong="H3045"\w* \w me|strong="H3045"\w* full \w of|strong="H3045"\w* joy \w and|strong="H2451"\w* rapture; so \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* bones which \w have|strong="H3045"\w* been broken may \w be|strong="H2451"\w* glad.
Let \w your|strong="H3526"\w* face be turned \w from|strong="H2398"\w* my wrongdoing, \w and|strong="H2398"\w* take away all my \w sins|strong="H2398"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H8085"\w* \w a|strong="H8085"\w* clean \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* me, \w O|strong="H8085"\w* God; \w give|strong="H8085"\w* me \w a|strong="H8085"\w* right spirit again.

\w Do|strong="H3605"\w* not put \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*, \w or|strong="H5771"\w* take \w your|strong="H3605"\w* holy spirit \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.

Give \w me|strong="H7130"\w* back \w the|strong="H3559"\w* joy \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* salvation; let \w a|strong="H3559"\w* free \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w my|strong="H3559"\w* \w support|strong="H3559"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3947"\w* \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w I|strong="H4480"\w* \w make|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* ways clear \w to|strong="H6440"\w* wrongdoers; \w and|strong="H6440"\w* sinners \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w be|strong="H0408"\w* turned \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w Be|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* saviour \w from|strong="H7725"\w* violent death, O God, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* God \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*; \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* tongue \w will|strong="H7307"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* praise \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* righteousness.

O Lord, let \w my|strong="H7725"\w* lips \w be|strong="H7725"\w* open, \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* mouth \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w make|strong="H7725"\w* clear \w your|strong="H7725"\w* praise.

\w You|strong="H5337"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* no desire \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w an|strong="H0430"\w* offering \w or|strong="H1818"\w* I would give \w it|strong="H6666"\w*; \w you|strong="H5337"\w* \w have|strong="H0430"\w* no delight \w in|strong="H0430"\w* burned offerings.

\w The|strong="H5046"\w* offerings \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w* \w are|strong="H8193"\w* \w a|strong="H5046"\w* broken spirit; \w a|strong="H5046"\w* broken \w and|strong="H6310"\w* sorrowing \w heart|strong="H8193"\w*, \w O|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0136"\w*, \w you|strong="H5046"\w* \w will|strong="H0136"\w* not \w put|strong="H6310"\w* \w from|strong="H8193"\w* \w you|strong="H5046"\w*.

Do good \w to|strong="H5414"\w* Zion \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* good \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w*, building \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* walls \w of|strong="H2077"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H7307"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* delight \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H7665"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness, \w in|strong="H0430"\w* burned \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* beasts; \w then|strong="H7307"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* oxen \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* altar.
